channel.title: Mont Royal on Pastel Cravings

item.title: Yokato Yokabai
item.description: I don’t know if you can tell already but I’m a die hard fan of ramen. Like ANY type of ramen. I love them all <3 It’s always been my favourite thing when I learn about a new ramen restaurant opening in Montreal. But from all the dozens of restaurants I tried, nothing beats the ramen from Yokato Yokabai. This will be a very big statement but I think this is the BEST ramen restaurant so far.
